subject: Rajasthan History
question_en: What was the capital of Rajasthan until 1929?
question_hi: राजस्थान की 1929 तक राजधानी क्या थी ?
explanation_en: Jodhpur was the capital of Rajasthan until 1929. After that, the capital was shifted to Jaipur.
explanation_hi: जोधपुर राजस्थान की 1929 तक राजधानी थी। बाद मंगलम से राजधानी की वर्तमान मंगलम है।

subject: Rajasthan History
question_en: Which king established the Mewar kingdom in Rajasthan?
question_hi: राजस्थान मेवार के किसी समाजगत की स्थान है।
explanation_en: Pratap Singh, also known as Rana Kumbha, established the Mewar kingdom in Rajasthan.
